Condor:

Most of Maximal program was erased, just a small piece of Maximal 
programing hid itself in Condor's circuitry... But machine kept 
Condor in stasis lock, letting Switchblade work


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Switchblade::
> 
> Switchblade pops himself out of the machine, and transforms into 
> robot mode, allowing the machine to finish the job. "There, now to 
> begin construction." He pulls out another welder, and begins to 
> mark Condor's exoskeleton with small gashes with the welder.
> 
> On 23 Apr 2001, at 23:42, airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > Condor:
> > 
> > Condor's maximal program couldn't avoid reprogramation process 
for a 
> > large time, and slowly Decpeticon's program started to erase it 
> > altought Maximal's tried to avoid that...
> >
